title: Update Apple bubble background to bright green and black theme

requirements.text: Update the site-wide background to keep the existing Apple-style bubble aesthetic but switch the palette to bright green and black, including both desktop and mobile/portrait backgrounds.

quotes: make back ground in same apple boubble theme but in bright green abd black colour

acceptanceCriteria: Desktop background uses a bright green + black Apple-bubble style image and retains a similar glossy/bubble look to the current design.
Mobile/portrait background uses a matching bright green + black Apple-bubble style image.
No broken image URLs; background renders on initial load without layout shift.

requirements.text: Update floating bubble decorative overlays to match the bright green and black Apple-bubble theme so the hero section background decor visually matches the new site-wide background.

quotes: make back ground in same apple boubble theme but in bright green abd black colour

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section floating bubble overlays match the updated bright green + black bubble style.
Decor remains subtle (similar opacity levels) and does not reduce text readability in the hero section.

requirements.text: Adjust the global background overlay/gradient (in global CSS) as needed so the bright green + black bubble background remains readable behind content while preserving the Apple-bubble aesthetic.

quotes: make back ground in same apple boubble theme but in bright green abd black colour

acceptanceCriteria: Text and key UI elements remain readable over the new background in both light and dark theme modes.
Overlay does not fully wash out the bright green accents; bubbles remain visible.
Background remains fixed/cover behavior as currently implemented.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrap paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Backend is single-actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Changing typography, layout, or section content beyond what is necessary to maintain readability on the new background.
Adding new authentication, data storage, or backend features.

edits: Recolor to a bright green and black Apple-bubble theme while retaining a glossy, floating-bubble look (site-background-neon-bubbles.dim_1920x1080.png > site-background-neon-bubbles-green-black.dim_1920x1080.png)

Recolor to a matching bright green and black Apple-bubble theme for mobile/portrait (site-background-neon-bubbles-mobile.dim_1080x1920.png > site-background-neon-bubbles-mobile-green-black.dim_1080x1920.png)

Recolor bubble overlay elements to match bright green and black theme while keeping transparency suitable for overlay usage (bubble-overlays-transparent.dim_1024x1024.png > bubble-overlays-transparent-green-black.dim_1024x1024.png)
